word:
God help us, brethren, to wake up and stir ourselves now to do as much as the paralytic did; to do as much as the impotent 
                                                                           76
man did and as much as the one with the palsied arm did. They did just as they were told. God help us to believe on the Son of God and that He can save us to the utmost, and we shall have everlasting life.
